metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8864 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Roundcube Webmail before 1.0.9and 1.1.x before 1.1.5 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary webscript or HTML via a crafted SVG, a different vulnerability thanCVE-2016-4068.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8864` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

roundcube - 1.2~beta+dfsg.1-0ubuntu1
roundcube-core - 1.2~beta+dfsg.1-0ubuntu1
roundcube-mysql - 1.2~beta+dfsg.1-0ubuntu1
roundcube-pgsql - 1.2~beta+dfsg.1-0ubuntu1
roundcube-plugins - 1.2~beta+dfsg.1-0ubuntu1
roundcube-sqlite3 - 1.2~beta+dfsg.1-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: roundcube package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.2~beta+dfsg.1-0ubuntu1').
